title: The Warren Witches (Charmed)
features: The most important thing in the Charmed Ones' lives isn't magic, and it's not their jobs or their clothes. It's family. Piper, Phoebe, and Paige are Warren witches -- the latest in a long line of women with incredible supernatural strength. For more than two centuries, the Warren witches have fearlessly practiced magic: From Melinda Warren in the 1600s to the Charmed Ones in 2005, the power of these witches is unsurpassed.

recounts never-before-told stories of their lives -- as women, as witches, and, most important, as members of a family of considerable magical strength and power. Above all, they are family; beyond all, they are witches.
description: "Before Melinda Warren burned at the stake, she vowed that each generation of Warren witches would become stronger and stronger, culminating in the arrival of three sisters..."
store: Laura J. Burns (Author),  Micol Ostow (Author),  Greg Elliot (Author),  Paul Ruditis (Author),  Erica Pass (Author),  Cameron Dokey (Author),  Diana G. Gallagher (Author)
